name: Online Graduation Exhibition Website
intro: Responsive web app built with Vue.js and GreenSock Animation Platform APIs (GSAP).

name: Blood Pressure Record Bot
intro: Using Line Bot to record daily blood pressure, users can easily view records from the bot or the LIFF (web).

name: SeatBao
intro: The app used to solve the problem of finding the seats in the library.

name: College Welcome Camp Scoring System
intro: A scoring system built with HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL aimed to engage users and reduce manual workload.

name: Team Member Finder
intro: An online board that show off the expertises of the classmates and helping them to find the most suitable team member.

name: HCSE Website
intro: A website introducing the HCSE with a shopping cart that users can easily add items to it.
